Lunarpine (in robot mode) wanders around the new base, he doesnt like 
the smell. To much metal for the likes of his tastes. The new 
Maximals may have taken beast forms, but they haven't spent enough 
time in the wild to develope a natural one. Almost sickened by yet 
another technological intrusion to this planets natural growth he 
headed to the door.

"Lunarpine to Striker, I'm stepping out, you wanna join me?"

Just the thought of a decent hunt made Lunarpine pant with 
anticipation.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl::
> 
> Prowl looks over at Shadow Wing as she flies up to him. He shruggs, 
a hard 
> thing to do while flying.
> 
> "The newcomer's base is closer than all the rest. They also stand 
in the way 
> of us and the preds. And the Alliance for that matter. With any 
luck, they'll 
> keep us safe without even knowing it."
> 
> Prowl frowns, thinking of something. "But they're the ones that did 
the most 
> damage to the Ark. Maybe we should attack them and try to take them 
out."
